SystemDebtEngine"}},"mintUnbackedStablecoin(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Mint unbacked stablecoin without any collateral to be used for incentives and flash mint.access: deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@notice A contract which acts as a book keeper of the Fathom Stablecoin protocol. 
It has the ability to move collateral token and stablecoin with in the accounting state variable.
@dev access: OWNER_ROLE, GOV_ROLE
@dev access: OWNER_ROLE, GOV_ROLE

@dev Give an allowance to the `usr` address to adjust the position address who is the caller.
 @dev `usr` The address to be allowed to adjust position

@dev Revoke an allowance from the `usr` address to adjust the position address who is the caller.
 @dev `usr` The address to be revoked from adjusting position
@dev access: OWNER_ROLE
@dev access: OWNER_ROLE
@dev access: OWNER_ROLE
@dev access: OWNER_ROLE, SHOW_STOPPER_ROLE
@dev access: OWNER_ROLE, SHOW_STOPPER_ROLE

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => struct BookKeeper.Position storage ref))
function (bytes32) view external returns (struct ICollateralPoolConfig.CollateralPoolInfo memory)
mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => struct BookKeeper.Position storage ref))
mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => struct BookKeeper.Position storage ref))
mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => struct BookKeeper.Position storage ref))
function (bytes32) view external returns (struct ICollateralPoolConfig.CollateralPoolInfo memory)
mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => struct BookKeeper.Position storage ref))
function (bytes32) view external returns (struct ICollateralPoolConfig.CollateralPoolInfo memory)

documentation.text: @param _value the value of stablecoin to be used to settle bad debt [rad]

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32) view external returns (struct ICollateralPoolConfig.CollateralPoolInfo memory)

params._debtAccumulatedRate: The difference value of `debtAccumulatedRate` which will be added to the current value of `debtAccumulatedRate`. [ray]
params._stabilityFeeRecipient: The address which will receive the surplus from Stability Fee. This will always be SystemDebtEngine who will use the surplus to settle bad debt.

addCollateral(bytes32,address,int256).details: Add or remove collateral token balance to an address within the accounting of the protocolaccess: ADAPTER_ROLE

adjustPosition(bytes32,address,address,a.details: Adjust a position on the target position address to perform locking/unlocking of collateral and minting/repaying of stablecoinaccess: POSITION_MANAGER_ROLE

params._collateralOwner: The payer/receiver of the collateral token, the collateral token must already be deposited into the protocol in case of locking the collateral
params._collateralValue: The value of the collateral to lock/unlock
params._debtShare: The debt share of stalbecoin to mint/repay. Please pay attention that this is a debt share not debt value.
params._stablecoinOwner: The payer/receiver of the stablecoin, the stablecoin must already be deposited into the protocol in case of repaying debt

blacklist(address).details: Revoke an allowance from the `usr` address to adjust the position address who is the caller.`usr` The address to be revoked from adjusting position

params._collateralAmount: The amount of collateral to be confiscated [wad]
params._collateralCreditor: The address which will temporarily own the collateral of the liquidated position; this will always be the Auctioneer
params._debtShare: The debt share to be confiscated [wad]
params._stablecoinDebtor: The address which will be the one to be in debt for the amount of stablecoin debt of the liquidated position, this will always be the SystemDebtEngine

mintUnbackedStablecoin(address,address,u.details: Mint unbacked stablecoin without any collateral to be used for incentives and flash mint.access: MINTABLE_ROLE

params._from: The address which will be the one who incur bad debt (will always be SystemDebtEngine here)
params._to: The address which will receive the minted stablecoin
params._value: The value of stablecoin to be minted [rad]

moveCollateral(bytes32,address,address,u.details: Move a balance of collateral token from a source address to a destination address within the accounting of the protocolaccess: COLLATERAL_MANAGER_ROLE

movePosition(bytes32,address,address,int.details: Move the collateral or stablecoin debt inside a position to another positionaccess: POSITION_MANAGER_ROLE

params._collateralAmount: The amount of the locked collateral to be moved
params._debtShare: The debt share of stalbecoin to be moved

moveStablecoin(address,address,uint256).details: Move a balance of stablecoin from a source address to a destination address within the accounting of the protocol

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params._value: the value of stablecoin to be used to settle bad debt [rad]

whitelist(address).details: Give an allowance to the `usr` address to adjust the position address who is the caller.`usr` The address to be allowed to adjust position

positionWhitelist.details: This is the mapping which stores the consent or allowance to adjust positions by the position addresses.`address` The position address`address` The allowance delegate address`uint256` true (1) means allowed or false (0) means not allowed

userdoc.notice: A contract which acts as a book keeper of the Fathom Stablecoin protocol.  It has the ability to move collateral token and stablecoin with in the accounting state variable.
